name: Stone Pickaxe
description: The Stone Pickaxe is the firstPickaxeavailable to prospectors and is used to break apart mineableMinerals, reducing them to usable resources. Stone, Sulfur, Oxite, Silica, Coal, Salt, Copper, Iron, Gold, and Exotic nodes can be mined with a Stone Pickaxe. To mine Aluminium, Platinum, and Titanium, prospectors must use aSteel Pickaxeor better.
